name: Piano Tap 2: Piano Flight
description:
Piano Flight - Crazy roller coaster!

Enough to crawl on the ground and step on the tiles! It's time to take off into the sky!
It's time to play the "Piano Flight". It's an incredible sequel Piano Tap and Piano Tap 2.
The Pyramids, the Eiffel Tower, the Golden Gate, the Great Wall of China and a lot of interesting are waiting for us.
The notes are waiting for us directly in the sky!
Tap on black notes. Don't touch white notes. Press and hold long notes.
Manage and increase the tempo of the tune.
Try to get more points.
Try to complete a tune on three stars. Unlock the best tunes.
Contact us, any places in the world you want to fly.
Contact us, any new tunes you want to play.
